org.spf4j.concurrent

Class RetryExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spf4j.concurrent.RetryExecutor

  • public class RetryExecutor
extends Object
    Executor that will execute Callables with retry. This executor cannot be used inside a Completion service.
    Author:
    zoly
